lib/hope/typelist/typelistsort.h

00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include "hope/typelist/type_list.h"
00012 
00013 namespace hope {
00014     namespace detail {
00015 
00016         struct sort_helper {
00017             constexpr sort_helper(std::size_t index, std::size_t size) noexcept
00018                 : type_index(index)
00019                 , type_size(size)
00020             { }
00021 
00022             constexpr bool operator<(const sort_helper& r) const {
00023                 return type_size < r.type_size;
00024             }
00025 
00026             constexpr bool operator>(const sort_helper& r) const {
00027                 return type_size > r.type_size;
00028             }
00029 
00030             std::size_t     type_index;
00031             std::size_t     type_size;
00032         };
00033 
00034         template <typename T>
00035         constexpr void swap(T&& l, T&& r) {
00036             auto temp{ r };
00037             r = static_cast<T&&>(l);
00038             l = static_cast<T&&>(temp);
00039         }
00040 
00041         template<std::size_t... Is, typename... Ts>
00042         constexpr auto sort_impl(std::index_sequence<Is...> sequence, type_list<Ts...> list) {
00043             constexpr auto listSize = size(list);
00044             std::array<sort_helper, listSize> sizes{ sort_helper(Is, sizeof(Ts))... };
00045 
00046             // should be replaced with std::sort in cxx20
00047             for (size_t i{ 0 }; i < listSize; ++i) {
00048                 auto it = std::max_element(std::begin(sizes) + i, std::end(sizes));
00049                 size_t pos = std::distance(std::begin(sizes), it);
00050                 if (i != pos)
00051                     swap(sizes[i], sizes[pos]);
00052             }
00053             return sizes;
00054         }
00055 
00056         template<std::size_t... Is, typename... Ts>
00057         constexpr auto sort_type_list(std::index_sequence<Is...> sequence, type_list<Ts...> list) {
00058             constexpr auto sorted_index_array = detail::sort_impl(sequence, list);
00059             return make_type_list(get_nth_type<sorted_index_array[Is].type_index>(list)...);
00060         }
00061 
00062     }
00063 
00064     template <typename... Ts>
00065     constexpr auto sort(type_list<Ts...> list) {
00066         constexpr auto sorted_index_array = detail::sort_type_list<>(std::make_index_sequence<size(list)>(), list);
00067         return sorted_index_array;
00068     }
00069 }
